name: launch-notification-broadcaster
description: Use this to parse Audit Events by Adobe Launch

scripts.install: npm run zip &&  wsk action create adobe-launch-notifications --kind nodejs:12 ./adobe-launch-notifications.zip --web true
scripts.add-get-api: wsk api create /notifications /launch get adobe-launch-notifications --response-type http
scripts.add-post-api: wsk api create /notifications /launch post adobe-launch-notifications --response-type http
scripts.add-apis: npm run add-post-api && npm run add-get-api
scripts.update: del adobe-launch-notifications.zip | npm run zip && wsk action update adobe-launch-notifications --kind nodejs:12 ./adobe-launch-notifications.zip --web true
scripts.delete: wsk action delete adobe-launch-notifications && wsk api delete /notifications

author: Prateek Kejriwal
